description: I'm a software developer passionate about creating digital experiences that make a real impact. With a constant drive to learn and grow, I focus on building innovative solutions that solve problems and improve lives. I hold a Computer Engineering degree from Gazi University, which provided me with a strong technical foundation to tackle complex challenges. My goal is to contribute to meaningful projects that push the boundaries of technology and leave a lasting impression.
